law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 1, effective April 1, 2008.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/1/2008). 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 1, subsec. (8) defines "wholesale dealer," in part, as "any person who acts as a 'nonresident wholesale,' 'resident wholesaler,' or 'unclassified acquirer' as defined in KRS 138.130 . . ." KRS 138.130 defines "nonresident wholesaler," "resident wholesaler," and "unclassified acquirer." Pursuant to KRS 7.136(1)(h), the Reviser of Statutes has changed "nonresident wholesale" to "nonresident wholesaler" in subsection (8)(b) of this section during codification to correct this manifest clerical or typographical error.
